statements: DELETE FROM protein_secondary_structure WHERE protein_name = 'Protein ABC';
DELETE FROM protein_secondary_structure WHERE protein_id = 1 AND secondary_structure = 'alpha helix';
DELETE FROM protein_secondary_structure WHERE secondary_structure = 'beta sheet' AND protein_name = 'Protein X';
DELETE FROM researcher_information WHERE institution = 'University A';
DELETE FROM secondary_structures WHERE start_position > 100 AND end_position <= 200;
DELETE FROM Protein_Secondary_Structure WHERE protein_name = 'Example Protein';
DELETE FROM Protein_Locations WHERE location_description = 'Active Site';
DELETE FROM ProteinInteraction WHERE protein1_id = 1 OR protein2_id = 3;
